text: Frederick D'Souza (4 December 1934 - 11 July 2016) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1961, D'Souza served as bishop of the diocese of Jhansi, India from 1977 to 2012.Diocese of Jhansi ==Notes== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Indian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Frederick D'Souza
